Box System:
We changed the standard system of drop items and now boxes with different contents are droping from monsters around the world which is described below:
Rescource Box Low/Mid/Top/Gold Grade - from these boxes receive various resources that are needed to improve bracelets, cloaks and also perform some quests.
Potion Box A/S Grade - from these boxes get potions of CP and elixirs of A and S grades.
Enchant Box C/B/A/Gold Grade - with these boxes with a chance you can get scrolls to improve weapons and equipment of various grades.
Faction Box - with these boxes you can get personal and factional portals that will help you on the battlefield.
Dye Box - with these boxes you can get all kinds of dyes +4 -4 to enhance the basic characteristics of your character.
